item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Support for Ukraine continues to be strong, with the United States promising to provide addit...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Support for Ukraine continues to be strong, with the United States promising to provide additional weapons by Christmas. However, Washington has informed European allies that it will step back from being the main security guarantor in NATO's non-nuclear domain. The Pentagon has underscored that the Indo-Pacific region is a key priority, making any changes to NATO's defense commitments unavoidable. Earlier, RTRS reported that the U.S. plans to shift more NATO defense expenses onto EU nations by 2027.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The latest U.S. national security strategy has taken Europe by surprise, reshaping traditional ...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The latest U.S. national security strategy has taken Europe by surprise, reshaping traditional alliances. In a 30-page report, European nations are portrayed as waning powers that have relinquished some of their sovereignty to the EU. The U.S. is now seen more as a mediator between Europe and Russia, raising questions about Europe's future as a dependable ally. Read more from WSJ.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The Monroe Doctrine continues to hold significance, designating the Western Hemisphere as a spher...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The Monroe Doctrine continues to hold significance, designating the Western Hemisphere as a sphere of U.S. influence. Following a period of oversight, the U.S. is set to re-establish its military presence in this area, with a focus on safeguarding its territory. The Pentagon's objectives include securing U.S. military and commercial access to key regions such as the Panama Canal, the Caribbean, the Gulf of Mexico, the Arctic, and Greenland. Under the Trump administration, plans to modernize the nuclear triad are underway, with Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth indicating that military engagement may be limited to protecting national interests.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Hegseth emphasized that the United States does not plan to alter the current status of Taiwan...
item.description:
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Hegseth emphasized that the United States does not plan to alter the current status of Taiwan and has no intention of asserting dominance in the region. He stated, "Our interests in the Indo-Pacific are important but remain limited and reasonable. Our goal is not to overpower China, but to ensure that it does not overpower us or our allies."
In early December, China's Foreign Ministry called on the US to halt all communications with Taiwanese officials.

item.description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º SberCIB's baseline projection for 2026 indicates that the ruble is expected to depreciate further, hitting 14.7 RUB per yuan and 100 RUB per dollar. This outlook is influenced by several factors, including a decrease in the key interest rate, anticipated reductions in foreign currency sales by the Central Bank, and a possible decline in currency sales by exporters resulting from low oil prices.
